name: Steamboat Billy: The Curse of the Leviathan
summary: Most succinctly described as Zelda: Windwaker meets Pokemon, Steamboat Billy is a single-player adventure-rpg set in an old Disney-like universe in which you must befriend monsters while sailing the dark seas in order to survive, rebuild and bring back color to the world you once knew!
